snippet: A Shiite member of Parliament was among the dead, and an online statement from the Islamic State implied that the attack had targeted the lawmaker.
abstract: Suicide bomber detonates vehicle full of explosives near congested security checkpoint in Shiite neighborhood of Baghdad, killing 24 and wounding 40; victims include member of Parliament Ahmed al-Khafaji; Islamic State militants claim responsibility for attack.

byline.original: By KIRK SEMPLE and OMAR AL-JAWOSHY
byline.contributor: Ali Hamza contributed reporting from Baghdad, and employees of The New York Times from Baghdad, Tikrit and Hilla, Iraq.

lead_paragraph: A Shiite member of Parliament was among the dead, and an online statement from the Islamic State implied that the attack had targeted the lawmaker.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
